bill.title: Affordable Housing; Rental Housing Trust Fund; Appropriation ($)
bill.description: Appropriates funds for the Rental Housing Trust Fund to build affordable rental housing projects, including projects with micro units, family units, and elder housing units. (SB2442 HD1)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to HMS, WAM.
The committee(s) on HMS has scheduled a public hearing on 01-25-14 10:00AM in conference room 229.
The committee(s) on HMS deferred the measure until 01-27-14 1:15PM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on HMS recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in HMS were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Chun Oakland, Green, Taniguchi, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Kidani.
Reported from HMS (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2032) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-05-14 10:30AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 12 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, English, Espero, Kahele, Keith-Agaran, Kouchi, Ruderman, L. Thielen, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Tokuda.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2617) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-04-14.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 2 (Hee, Shimabukuro). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 194) in amended form (SD 1).
Pass First Reading
Referred to HSG, FIN, referral sheet 28
Bill scheduled to be heard by HSG on Monday, 03-17-14 9:00AM in House conference room 329.

The committees on HSG recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Hashem, Woodson, Creagan, Kobayashi, Morikawa, Oshiro, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Belatti, Carroll, Jordan.
Reported from HSG (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1077-14), recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
Passed Second Reading and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Lowen, Nakashima, Souki, Takai, Wooley excused (5).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Wednesday, 04-02-14 2:00PM in House conference room 308.
Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Nishimoto, Johanson, Cullen, Ing, Jordan, Kobayashi, Lowen, Morikawa, Onishi, Takayama, Tokioka, Woodson, Yamashita, Fukumoto, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Hashem.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1614-14) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Third Reading.
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 04-08-14.
Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Belatti, Oshiro excused (2). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 574).
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 670).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Chun Oakland Chair; Kidani Co-Chair; Keith-Agaran, Taniguchi, Slom Members.
House Conferees Appointed: Hashem, Woodson Co-Chairs; Tokioka, Ward Members.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 674).
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 685).
Conference committee meeting scheduled for 04-17-14 1:30PM in conference room 229.

Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-22-14 10:30AM in conference room 229.
